cases.title: Plus Package
cases.introduction: Plus Package sells individual snacks and drinks at bulk prices to college students, to help keep food prices down.

body.title: Purpose
body.text: Bulk food at everyday prices. Plus package helps you save time and money by splitting low cost, high quantity groceries into custom, affordable packages delivered weekly.

body.title: Lessons Learned
body.text: Bulk food at everyday prices. Plus package helps you save time and money by splitting low cost, high quantity groceries into custom, affordable packages delivered weekly.
